titleStmt.title: Some new observations and considerations upon the present state of things in England. The differences betweene King and Parliament impartially disputed, the persons on both sides truly anatomized and the publique faith vindicated. / By J.S. Gent.
titleStmt.author: J. S., gent.

notesStmt.note: Also published with title: Malignancy un-masked. With a plea for the publique fayth ... 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
